capability.name: Bank Guarantee
capability.definition: This Service Domain handles the pricing and issuance of a broad range of bank guarantee instruments
capability.role: Orchestrate the pricing, issuance and subsequent fulfillment activities for Bank Guarantees as used in corporate/correspondent trade and project finance activity
capability.example: A bank guarantee is provided to a corporate client to cover international trade finance deal

key_features.name: Price and issue bank guarantees for bank customers
key_features.description: Enables price and issue bank guarantees for bank customers to support this service domain handles the pricing and issuance of a broad range of bank guarantee instruments

key_features.name: Evaluate claims and make payments against the guarantee
key_features.description: Enables evaluate claims and make payments against the guarantee to support this service domain handles the pricing and issuance of a broad range of bank guarantee instruments

key_features.name: Recover collateral against redeemed guarantees where applicable
key_features.description: Enables recover collateral against redeemed guarantees where applicable to support this service domain handles the pricing and issuance of a broad range of bank guarantee instruments
